dispute-submission-alert.title: Your dispute submission is in progress
dispute-submission-alert.description: An email confirmation has been sent to <bold>{{ email }}</bold>. You should also receive a confirmation letter in the mail within 60 days. We expect to issue a decision within 180 days and will notify you of the outcome in a follow-up letter.

first-action.header: We’ll confirm when we processed your request
first-action.description: After we receive your submission, we’ll review your dispute. You should receive a confirmation letter by mail within 60 days.

second-action.description: A decision is normally made within 180 days.  We will send you a letter with the outcome.
